reviewText:
This a good flick for Adriano Celantano fans. But this comedy does not look so funny for me in 2017 like it was in 1983. A little slow and sad.
And there is no Captions from Italian.
Movie is a classic. Disc was loose in DVD case and scratched. It still worked tho.
I wanted to watch movies outside American file for a change. I saw this and watch it. It was hilarious.
about finding a wild man in the jungle, and teaching him to be human again. and later teaching his own class.
I had a really good time watching this movie!! Maybe its a little old, but able to give a great entertainment!!

Definately one of Celentano's Classic Films, I thought I would never ever find this film though it certainly is a rarity & definately a great film.
Ohhhh....ohhhhhhhhhhhhhh (If you have seen the film you know what I mean)
